title: RPGitem报错，创建的物品全部不见
author: Mai_Pian
txt_content:
RPGItems (3.0.4) ItemManager.load
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException: Cannot create section at empty path
        at org.apache.commons.lang.Validate.notEmpty(Validate.java:321)
        at org.bukkit.configuration.MemorySection.createSection(MemorySection.java:234)

replies.author: 咕
replies.txt_content: rpgitem的配置文件坏了，删掉重开吧

replies.author: Forever_NB
replies.txt_content:
你可以换一个新的rpgitem了
出4.0.9了

replies.author: 箜霜
replies.txt_content: RPGitem文件夹报错了，直接删除文件夹，然后重新启动会生成的
